actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide that members of the Armed Forces may be separated or discharged from active service only by an honorable discharge, a general discharge, or discharge by a court martial.

summary.text: Provides that members of the Armed Forces may be separated or discharged from active service only by an honorable discharge, a general discharge, or discharge by court-martial.

titles.title: A bill to provide that members of the Armed Forces may be separated or discharged from active service only by an honorable discharge, a general discharge, or discharge by a court martial.
